name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: High performance laptop with M2 Pro chip, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Perfect for developers and creative professionals.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless gaming mouse with 6 programmable buttons, RGB lighting, and 16000 DPI sensor.

name: Automatic Coffee Maker
description: Programmable drip coffee maker with thermal carafe, 12-cup capacity, and auto-brew timer.

name: USB-C Multiport Hub
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with 4K HDMI output, 3 USB 3.0 ports, SD/microSD card readers, and 100W power delivery.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch control, 5 color temperatures, 5 brightness levels, and USB charging port.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches, programmable keys, and aluminum frame.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium sound quality.

name: Standing Desk Converter
description: Height adjustable standing desk converter with dual monitor support and spacious keyboard tray.

name: Smart Watch
description: Fitness tracker smart watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

name: Portable SSD
description: Ultra-fast 1TB portable SSD with USB-C 3.2 Gen 2, up to 1050MB/s read speeds, shock and vibration resistant.

name: Air Purifier
description: HEPA air purifier for large rooms, removes 99.97% of airborne particles, quiet operation with sleep mode.

name: Webcam 1080p
description: Full HD 1080p webcam with auto-focus, stereo microphones, and wide-angle lens for video conferencing.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Variable temperature electric kettle with 1.7L capacity, 6 preset temperatures, and keep-warm function.

name: Monitor 27-inch 4K
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with IPS panel, 99% sRGB color gamut, HDR support, and USB-C connectivity.

name: Robot Vacuum
description: Smart robot vacuum with mapping, app control, 2000Pa suction, and automatic dirt disposal.
